irasshaimasu: be, go, come (respectful equivalent of います、いきます and きます)
meshiagarimasu: eat, drink (respectful equivalent of たべます and のみます)
osshaimasu: say (respectful equivalent of いいます)
goranni narimasu: see, look at (respectful equivalent of みます)
gozonjidesu: know (respectful equivalent of しっています)
aisatsu: greeting, address (～をします: greet, give an address)
deha: well, then (polite equivalent of じゃ)
yoroshiku otsutaekudasai: Give my best regards./Please say hello.
shitsureiitashimasu: Good-bye (humble equivalent of しつれいします)
omochidesu: have (respectful way of saying もっています)
soredeha: well, so (indicating an end or beginning)
